entities.name: nearly headless nick
entities.description: Nearly Headless Nick is a ghost who rises into the air and glides back towards the Gryffindor table in affronted tones.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore gets to his feet at the staff table and greets the room with a smile.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione gasps in surprise when she notices Dumbledore's blackened hand.

relationships.description: Ron makes a sarcastic comment about Harry being already dead, which is directed towards Dumbledore.
Nearly Headless Nick rises into the air and glides back towards the Gryffindor table.
Dumbledore greets the room with a smile, his arms opened wide as though to embrace the whole room.
Hermione notices Dumbledore's blackened hand and gasps in surprise.
